term.project.cis350

Class ModRecListThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • term.project.cis350.ModRecListThread

  • public class ModRecListThread
extends java.lang.Object
    This thread allows the gui to quickly update and offer new movies while the Movie DB is updated.
    Author:
    Chris
